00029 namespace Hypertable {
00030 
00032   class Cell {
00033   public:
00034     Cell() : row_key(0), column_family(0), column_qualifier(0),
00035         timestamp(AUTO_ASSIGN), revision(AUTO_ASSIGN), value(0), value_len(0),
00036         flag(FLAG_INSERT) { }
00037 
00038     Cell(const char *rk, const char *cf, const char *cq, uint64_t ts,
00039          uint64_t rev, uint8_t *val, uint32_t vlen, uint8_t flag)
00040       : row_key(rk), column_family(cf), column_qualifier(cq), timestamp(ts),
00041         revision(rev), value(val), value_len(vlen), flag(flag) { }
00042 
00043     void sanity_check() const {
00044       if (!row_key || !*row_key)
00045         HT_THROW(Error::BAD_KEY, "Invalid row key - cannot be zero length");
00046 
00047       if (row_key[0] == (char)0xff && row_key[1] == (char)0xff)
00048         HT_THROW(Error::BAD_KEY, "Invalid row key - cannot start with "
00049                  "character sequence 0xff 0xff");
00050     }
00051 
00052     const char *row_key;
00053     const char *column_family;
00054     const char *column_qualifier;
00055     uint64_t timestamp;
00056     uint64_t revision;
00057     const uint8_t *value;
00058     uint32_t value_len;
00059     uint8_t flag;
00060   };
00061 
00062   std::ostream &operator<<(std::ostream &, const Cell &);

00064 } // namespace Hypertable
